amendment.purpose: An amendment to strike the words "iron-clad friendship" from the first clause of the preamble and to insert in lieu thereof "enduring friendship".

vote.text: On agreeing to the Chabot amendment (A001) Agreed to without objection.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A001) offered by Mr. Chabot.
Amendment agreed to by House: On agreeing to the Chabot amendment (A001) Agreed to without objection.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Chabot amendment (A001) Agreed to without objection.
